name: GitHub Galaxy Virtual Americas
content: Join us virtually for GitHub Galaxy Explore GitHubʼs vision for AI-powered development, productivity, and modernization—and discover how to enhance developer workflows, seamlessly integrate security with DevSecOps, and more. Ready to explore our blueprint for AI-powered development? Tune into this virtual event where we’ll cover how to modernize the software development lifecycle and transform your enterprise. Here’s what to expect: Get best practices for supercharging innovation without sacrificing security. Explore GitHub Copilot, our AI-powered coding assistant, and see how it transforms the developer experience. Witness how GitHub tools can collectively enhance collaboration, reduce time-to-market, and contribute to the success of your tech initiatives. Who is this for? This event is for those who want to discover how to harness our AI-powered platform to supercharge productivity and collaboration at scale.
